amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to allocate funding for the VA to create an opioid abuse healthcare kit for community healthcare providers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
